ActivityPicker.ActivityDesc: One of the best things to do to pass time at home is baking! Chocolate chip cookies are many people's favorite. It's an activity that you can do, but also eat afterwards. To view the full recipe, click on the More Information button.
ActivityPicker.ActivitySupplies: Granulated sugar, Brown sugar, Salt, Unsalted butter, 1 egg, Vanilla extract, All-purpose flour, Baking soda, Chocolate chunks/chips

ActivityPicker.ActivityDesc: Charades is a game of pantomimes. You have to act out a phrase without speaking and have your team members try to guess what the phrase is. Your team members must guess the phrase as quickly as possible before the time runs out.
Painting with acrylics is one of the most common ways to paint. It is versatile, fun, and easy. Acrylics can be used in many different ways to create many different styles of art.
ActivityPicker.ActivitySupplies: Acrylic paint, Canvas, Paint brushes, Palette, Cup of water, Rags or paper towels, Brush cleaner or soap, Varnish

ActivityPicker.ActivityDesc: Stream and watch a movie at the comfort and privacy of your own home! You have the freedom to pause anytime and eat anything you want. You can choose any movie you want on any device that you would like with whoever you want to.
ActivityPicker.ActivitySupplies: Internet-enabled device, Subscription to a streaming site, Snacks, Cozy blanket, Comfortable seat

ActivityPicker.ActivityDesc: A jigsaw puzzle is a tiling puzzle that requires the assembly of often oddly shaped interlocking and mosaiced pieces. Typically, each individual piece has a portion of a picture and when assembled, they produce a complete picture.
Instead of having a meal with someone like usual, you can be creative and make it fun by having an indoor picnic. There's no need to worry about the weather, bugs, or a sunburn.
ActivityPicker.ActivitySupplies: Blanket, Cushions, Main meal, Charcuterie board or finger foods, Desserts, Music
